title: ISic001811. I.Sicily inscription 001811
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΓΟΡ.[...]
2ΕΛΕΥΘΕΡΗ[.]

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon drawing published by Orsi 1893 and in inventory; inventory drawing shows clear break immediately after final H of line 2

English translation

Purchase of Eleuthere

commentary

bibliography

  • Orsi 1893 289 no. 43 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
  • Strazzulla 1897 141 no. 177 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001390
